Percentage Calculator is a simple yet powerful tool that helps you perform common percentage calculations right from your browser. Whether you're a student, professional, or anyone who needs to work with percentages, this extension provides quick and accurate results without the need to open a separate calculator app or website.
Key Features:

Calculate Percentage of a Number:
Easily find out what percentage one number is of another. For example, what is 15% of 200?
Find Percentage Between Two Numbers:
Quickly determine what percentage one number is of another. For instance, 50 is what percentage of 200?
Calculate Percentage Increase/Decrease:
Effortlessly compute the percentage change between two values. For example, what is the percentage increase from 100 to 150?

How It Works:
Simply click on the extension icon to open a clean, user-friendly interface. Enter your numbers into the clearly labeled fields, click "Calculate," and get your result instantly. The extension performs calculations in real-time, providing immediate answers without page reloads.
Why Choose This Extension:

Fast and convenient: Perform calculations without leaving your current webpage
Clean interface: Easy-to-use design with no distracting ads or unnecessary features
Accurate results: Reliable calculations for all your percentage needs
Offline functionality: Works without an internet connection once installed

Perfect for:

Students working on math homework
Business professionals calculating discounts or growth rates
Anyone needing quick percentage calculations in their daily life

Install the Percentage Calculator extension today and simplify your percentage calculations!
